subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Sepp Blatter now says it would not be “responsible” to play a World Cup in Qatar in the summer. But where was that foresight when Qatar was awarded the 2022 World Cup?
snippet: Sepp Blatter now says it would not be “responsible” to play a World Cup in Qatar in the summer. But where was that foresight when Qatar was awarded the 2022 World Cup?
